thread.title: Djokovic extends streak to 27-0 at China Open, reaches semis
thread.title_full: Djokovic extends streak to 27-0 at China Open, reaches semis - San Francisco Chronicle

title: Djokovic extends streak to 27-0 at China Open, reaches semis
text: Photo: Andy Wong, AP Novak Djokovic of Serbia celebrates after defeating John Isner of the United States in the men's singles quarterfinal match of the China Open tennis tournament at the National Tennis Stadium in Beijing, Friday, Oct. 9, 2015. Novak Djokovic of Serbia celebrates after defeating John Isner of... BEIJING (AP) — Novak Djokovic extended his winning streak to 27 matches at the China Open with a 6-2, 6-2 win over John Isner on Friday to secure a place in the semifinals. Novak Djokovic of Serbia celebrates after defeating John Isner of the United States in the men's singles quarterfinal match of the China Open tennis tournament at the National Tennis Stadium in Beijing, Friday, Oct. 9, 2015. Novak Djokovic of Serbia celebrates after defeating John Isner of... BEIJING (AP) — Novak Djokovic extended his winning streak to 27 matches at the China Open with a 6-2, 6-2 win over John Isner on Friday to secure a place in the semifinals.
